name: Old Market Simulator: Prologue
description:
This is the prologue version of Old Market Simulator, a coop bazaar adventure where you and a partner can team up to pursue your dreams of becoming thriving market entrepreneurs! The prologue has the following features and the full game will add more fun mechanics to the list!

Build Your Own Market




In this immersive simulation game, you'll dive into the world of commerce as you purchase products from a variety of merchants, strategically place them on your shelves, and watch as customers flock to your market to snatch up your goods. But beware, running a successful business isn't just about making sales – it's about managing your reputation and staying afloat in a competitive marketplace.

Place Products Carefully




You and your partner can work together to build and expand your market empire. Invest your hard-earned profits into purchasing more shelves, expanding your store, and stocking up on even more products to attract a wider range of customers.

Check Your Calendar




In addition to managing day-to-day operations, keep an eye on special events and holidays that occur throughout the year. Events such as Halloween can significantly impact customer preferences and purchasing habits. For example, during Halloween, certain products like eggs and beers may experience a surge in demand, allowing you to adjust your storage and pricing strategies accordingly to capitalize on these trends. Stay vigilant and adapt your market offerings to meet the changing needs and desires of your customers during these special occasions.

Seasons




Keep in mind that product prices may differ according to seasons such as spring, winter, fall, and summer. Adjust your strategies accordingly to maximize profits and meet customer demands throughout the year.

Grow day by day




At the end of each day, review your income and expenses, and strive to keep your business afloat. With careful planning and cooperation, you can turn your small market into a thriving bazaar empire.

Permissions


Purchase the necessary permissions to sell different goods.

Grab a friend and start your journey in Old Market Simulator Prologue today! Don't forget to share your feedback in the discussions where we will listen to you to make the full game more fun!
